backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, file metadata, transfer records, AI processing results, and QR sessions with access‑controlled CRUD methods and file upload logic using mixin-based authorization and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to relevant frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and dark-mode overrides for the app.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point that loads the React app and registers PWA metadata including manifest and icons.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, theme, icons, and standalone display configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker providing offline caching of static assets and an app shell with cache-first fetch handling.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that switches between offline guest mode, profile setup, or authenticated dashboard and registers the service worker.
frontend/src/components/AIFeatures.tsx: Provides UI and logic for AI-based image compression and file recognition, managing file selection, compression progress, backend upload, and success dialogs.
frontend/src/components/FileTransfer.tsx: Handles file selection, drag-and-drop, uploading, QR-based transfers, and tracking transfer progress between online users.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding text.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the site header with branding, theme toggle, and user authentication/account controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Shows a login UI with branding and triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/components/OfflineFileShare: Enables exporting/importing offline share packages and saving imported files to the device.
frontend/src/components/OnlineUsers.tsx: Displays a list of online users with profile info and loading states for file-sharing availability.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Form component for creating a user profile by submitting a display name via a mutation hook, with success and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/QRCodeDialog.tsx: Generates a QR code session for a selected file, uploads the file, and displays a dynamically rendered QR image for sharing.
frontend/src/components/QRScannerModal.t: Modal that activates the camera to scan QR codes, fetches associated file metadata, and triggers file transfer when valid.
Displays a user's file transfer history with details like size, type, timestamps, and sender/receiver context.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, online status, user lists, and file operations using the app's actor and identity context.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind CSS layers and design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the app by mounting React, providing React Query and Internet Identity contexts.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard with tabs for file transfer, history, users, and AI features, managing online status and prefilled files.
frontend/src/pages/OfflineDashboard.tsx: Renders an offline-only interface for sharing files locally and explains the offline sharing process.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers a service worker on page load to enable offline capabilities.
frontend/src/utils/offlineSharePackage.t: Creates and imports self-contained HTML packages for offline file sharing by embedding files as base64.
frontend/src/utils/saveToDevice.ts: Saves a file to the device via the File System Access API with a fallback to a download link.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state persistence.
frontend/src/utils/useOnlineStatus.ts: Tracks browser online/offline status via event listeners and exposes a boolean flag.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config enabling dark mode, custom color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing the project’s current feature set and state, outlining existing Internet Computer–based auth, storage, and file‑sharing functionality.
